alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued October 25 at 10:01AM EDT until October 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Statement, through Thursday afternoon. For the High Rip Current Risk, until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest of the high tides at Lake Worth will occur mid to late morning on both Wednesday and Thursday
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
